comment.author: 45699610@N05
comment._content: where is the treaty of paris located now?

comment.author: 35740357@N03
comment._content: Hi Bridgetradtke, The Treaty of Paris is in the holdings of the National Archives; we actually had it on display a few years ago in the Rotunda of the National Archives building in Washington DC to celebrate its 225th birthday. To find out more information about other documents that shaped our country, visit: www.archives.gov/exhibits/charters/charters.html Mary (U.S. National Archives)
